video_title: 기억을 잃어도 잃을 수 없는 것, 알츠하이머 환자의 시선을 담은 영화 [스틸 앨리스] #홍진경의영화로운덕후생활 EP.65 | tvN 221014 방송
transcript: foreign [Music] [Music] can't find it can't find what I can't find my phone it's the middle of the night no I think it's important it goes off at eight o'clock in the morning and ask me these questions I have to find it we'll look forward to find it help me find my phone I hope you'll find it tomorrow I'll promise you tomorrow no tomorrow [Music] please oh my God oh no just looking for that last night wake up baby it's time to wake up it's time to get dressed I'm gonna help you okay Lean On Me [Music] as well for all of us but it's important to remember who Alice was she would not want to be a burden um [Music] you want to check out my headshot if I um send you a link can you open the file download the file yes hi Alice I'm you and I have something very important to say to you hi Alice okay and then and don't tell anyone what you're doing make sure that you're alone and go to your bedroom in your bedroom there's a dresser with a blue lamp open the top drawer in the back of the drawer there's a bottle with pills in it it says take all pills with water now there are a lot of pills in that bottle but it's very important that you swallow them all okay okay and then lie down and go to sleep and don't tell anyone what you're doing okay hello guys my teacher told me that butterflies don't live very long time and they live like a month or something and I was so upset and I went home and I told my mother and she said yeah but you know they have a nice life they have a really beautiful life so foreign foreign I've worked so hard for now all that is being ripped away we become ridiculous incapable comic but this is not Who We Are this is our disease I am not suffering I am struggling struggling to be a part of things stay connected to who I once was thank you [Applause]
